Best experience we’ve had in Miami! Josh, Kyle, Alex, Francesco, Rico, Juan and all the lovely staff made it a great night.

Splendid food, beautiful place and friendly waiter
Amazing sake, food & service 100% recommend

One of my favorite Miami experiences! We let the staff choose a beautiful array of choices and all were truly inspired! There's not a dish on the menu that isn't perfectly executed and decadently delicious! I will always return.
Horrible customer experience. We spent 600 hundred dollars in les than an hour, and they they need a table for another people and we were consuming. Not a good restaurant to go!

Great food and even better service! One of the best dining experiences I’ve ever had, food was amazing and waiters were super friendly and welcoming. Recommend Hotate Truffle Nigiri
Great services, great food, remenber is Japanese, Peruvian fusion.

A must for food lovers! Gorgeous ambiance, outstanding, very attentive customer service. And the food is just breathtaking. My absolute favorite are the tuna foie. We had a great dinner and will be back for sure.

This is by far the best sushi is Miami, the service is the only thing that makes it better! Absolutely amazing restaurant

This was our first time here and it was amazing. We went for brunch and my husband found this place on an email with a list of places to try in Miami. Peter was our server and we basically let him guide our entire meal and it was …
We had dinner at the bar. The bartenders were very friendly, we tried their signature pisco sour and it was amazing. The food was beyond great, definitely coming back!!!
best sushi in Miami. everything is delicious. from the nigiri to the tiraditos to the desserts everything is amazing.
One of the best food experience Miami can offer.

Were there last week. A blonde female hostess was so rude, so aggressive, that the thought of having a wonderful tranquil Japanese meal was impossible. We left without ordering anything. Very bad environment. No wonder the place was empty.

Special sushi was amazing. Good services, nice wines. We couldn’t taste it all. will be back ;)
This restaurant is amazing and spacious, the menu was delightful and the prices were very reasonable. quick, effective service and very personal staff members. Recommended.

Is it ever too early to tuck into a bowl of ceviche? Not for us, and that’s especially true when brunching at Osaka in Brickell. The Nikkei hot spot’s recently launched weekend menu combines raw Peruvian signatures—think tiraditos, ceviches …
Pricy, but worth every cent, food is stunning! Glad to see this place thriving, even on a random Tuesday night.
Delicious, great service  - hard to believe it doesn’t have more stars...

The Management Team needs to receive training on how to deal with customers in need of assistance. You can have the best restaurant in the world but the Management needs to realize that the customer is always right. I would highly recommend that Osaka have a the team go through an extensive training on customer service.

OMG.... it is just  omg.. the  qualities of food  so good  and fresh seafood.. and the vibe is so  fancy and trendy...  severs are  super friendly . Much better than other fancy but only expensive restaurants..
One of my preferred spots to grab something to eat. convenient location, neat, and awesome customer service. Very good job!
Best restaurant in Miami. Best nigiri I've ever had.
Amazing... from the drinks to each one of the plates. Totally recommended. It is definitely an experience.

Just an amazing, magical experience. The restaurant is fabulous, the staff is so professional and the food delicious. If I could I will give them 8 stars!!!! They deserve it highly!!! Thank you to our waiter Jasmany who was excellent! Thank you Yari for squeezing us in last minute!
Fantastic flavors, service and ambience
Top of de line Japanese food restaurant in brickell Miami
japanese food at this location - excellent. came in on a thurs. service is consistently above par. prices were average for the menu.

This is the best restaurant I've ever been to in Miami. The service was super friendly, prompt, and professional. They really had their act together. I ordered a variety of options and it was some of the best food I've ever had, it was exceptional. The cocktails were excellent as well.
Disgusting and very expensive not worth it at all waste of money and time

Don’t pay attention to the one star reviews. It’s really worth it to go and try it. It’s expensive but food, drinks, service, vibe, everything was beyond expectations so you pay for that. We had an amazing dinner!
Very delicious food and dishes is very great. Waitress was fast I like the place is close to my work so convenient thanks..

great service and recommendations from Pam, our server. She was patient and very pendiente of us. Pan never left us without food or drinks at the table which I appreciate ! Ambiance felt at a safe distance from other customers yet cozy

Honestly probably my favorite Japanese restaurant in Miami and maybe the best restaurant here. I eat at restaurants 5 days a week and I've eaten at the best restaurants around the world. The restaurant has amazing food and service oh, I was very surprised this should be a 4.8 not at 3.9

I went to eat at Osaka restaurant at Brickell in Miami and was a really bad experience i have seated for more Than 15 minutes and noobody came to ask For service. And the thing Its wasnt busy. So i wont never came back  again to this place

I had great expectations for this place since it opened! It was always booked, hard to find a reservation. I finally went there. I was not very trilled. The service was standard, the food was good but not as exotic and flavorful as the menu describe it. The ambience was nice, but it was overpriced. For 2 people we paid $350.
Excellent sushi this is a Miami must.

She recommended us great plates and ensure we were happy the entire time! Ask for her! you wont regret it.  Ill be back! Thanks Osaka Restaurant.
Delicious and great service!
Amazing service, bartender, servers and management

One of the worse experiences I had in a restaurant. They really don’t care about the clients. Never more in this place.

One of the worst services and experiences I’ve had at a restaurant. An incredibly bad miscommunication between the staff that reserve the table, the hosts and the manager. Even worst attitude and lack of courtesy from the Hosts and from Peter Singhsani, whom they say is the manager.

Nice place

Fantastic food. Highly recommend everything we got was delicious
Food was explicit but service was even better. Our waitress Pantip was super sweet and attentive without being too annoying or overpowering. Everything we had was delicious with amazing presentation!
Overrated. Poor service. Not worth it much better choices in Miami.

Food is good, the service is HORRIBLE. The waiter threw the bill like if I was at a fast food chain. He also got frustrated when I didn’t order the most expensive wine on the menu. We later spoke to management and nothing was done to correct this. Clearly they still need a lot of practice on the hospitality.

New in the neighborhood, I work in the industry and I come from New York therefore I have really high standards and expectations. Osaka is a great place, ambience, decor and most importantly Food are outstanding!! Also staff is very friendly...congratulations, I wish you all success!

great potio atmosphere and unique interior that sets itself off from the neighborhood.
